issue.title: [BUG] GitHub: new branches say "from <nothing>"
issue.body:
When dependabot creates a new branch, the message on IRC looks like:

> [simpicapp/simpic] dependabot-preview[bot] created branch dependabot/npm_and_yarn/frontend/mnemonist-0.34.0 from - https://github.com/simpicapp/simpic/commit/dcb6c41b4c84

<details>

repository.name: irc
